title: Snowbrother
description: As all in her tribe, Shkai'ra was trained from childhood with one goal in mind--efficiency in the arts of war. At the age of 19, Shkai'ra is given a mission by the elders of her tribe--cross the steppes and enslave a Mintzan city or die in disgrace. Formerly published by NAL (1984) in a substantially different form.
author: S.M. Stirling
